name: servify-testing
description: Servify API and frontend automation (Newman + Playwright)

scripts.test:smoke: npm run bootstrap && node scripts/run-newman.js --skip-bootstrap --folder Smoke && node scripts/run-playwright.js --skip-bootstrap --grep @smoke
scripts.test:e2e: npm run bootstrap && node scripts/run-newman.js --skip-bootstrap --folder E2E Flow && node scripts/run-playwright.js --skip-bootstrap --grep @e2e
scripts.test:all: npm run bootstrap && node scripts/run-newman.js --skip-bootstrap && node scripts/run-newman.js --skip-bootstrap --folder Negative Cases && node scripts/run-playwright.js --skip-bootstrap --grep @smoke && node scripts/run-playwright.js --skip-bootstrap --grep @e2e
